recipes.startdescription: A corner of something metallic protrudes from the soil...
recipes.desc: Once again, here's the Key to Hush House, half-buried in the garden.
A familiar iron key has washed up on the beach.
A familiar iron key is caught in a crevice.
A familiar iron key lies in a shallow rock-pool.

recipes.label: Draw up Water
recipes.desc: A familiar iron key nestles in the bucket.

recipes.label: Invite Echidna, Mother of Monsters, to Brancrug
recipes.startdescription: The summoning must be performed beyond the hearing of any profane ears - and far from any conceivable protection.
recipes.desc: I pour the milk in a wide circle, and watch as it sinks into the scabbed earth. Serpent-eyes glint from the gorse. The wind rises to a hissing shriek. Rain rattles from the sky. I have attracted someone's attention.

recipes.label: Summon, or Gather?
recipes.startdescription: [To summon Echidna, provide Serpent-Milk, and a total of 7 <sprite name=scale> - or leave out these requirements, and try to gather from the moors as usual.]
